alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 3:22PM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Strong gusty winds and heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel can be very difficult. Count on road closures due to snow cover at higher elevations. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches along with blowing snow that could significantly reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
